# `UpdateRowIndexRequest` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| rowId | `string` | Yes | The row UUID. |
| rowIndex | `number` | Yes | The updated row index. Must be an integer value greater than or equal to 1. Must be less than or equal to x, where x is the number of rows in the decision table version. |
